channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM Corporation -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM Corporation -- Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2017-1103|2024-08-05T13:25:17.055Z -- ibm%20corporation -- rational%20collaborative%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Team Concert (RTC) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose highly sensitive information or consume all available memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 120665.
